msg: CAMEL-2627: Added StopWatch and time startup/shutdown times of Camel. Also time @Converter loader.

author: gnodet
msg: FELIX-2248: fileinstall does not restart bundles when the underlying file is modified

author: gstein
msg: Be aggressive about flushing work items to the queue.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/merge.c:
(save_merge_result, eval_conflict_func_result,
preserve_pre_merge_files): do not take a LOG_ACCUM parameter, since
we'll place work items directly into the queue.
(maybe_resolve_conflicts): once we pass the interactive resolver,
starting queuing work immediately. adjust params to the above funcs.
(merge_text_file): assert that no work remains after calling the
resolver function. if we don't call it, then flush anything the caller
may have given us. then immediately flush any of our work.
(merge_binary_file): flush all work once we're past the interactive
resolver, then immediately flush any further work. ensure that any
work provided to us is flushed (when we don't do interactive
resolution).
(svn_wc__internal_merge): prior callers should have flushed all work
provided to us, and anything they needed. assert this, and don't
bother to queue any work.

author: clr
msg: Typo in assertion id

author: gstein
msg: Enable this script to run from the root of trunk
* tools/dev/wc-ng/count-progress.py:
(usage): new function, yanked from the __main__ logic
(__main__): call usage, as appropriate. if 'subversion' or 'tools' are
not in the current path, then see if ./subversion is present.
